Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Farnsworth - Your Claude Companion AI

A self-evolving AI companion that integrates with Claude Code via MCP to provide:

- Persistent Memory: MemGPT-style virtual context with archival, conversational, and knowledge graph storage
- Memory Dreaming: Background consolidation that discovers patterns during idle time
- Agent Swarm: Specialist agents \(Code, Reasoning, Research, Creative\) for task delegation
- Self-Evolution: NSGA-II genetic optimization that improves based on interactions
- User Avatar: Learns preferences for personalized responses

Key Features:
- Multi-backend LLM support \(Ollama, llama.cpp, BitNet\)
- Cascade inference with confidence-based model escalation
- Hybrid RAG with semantic + keyword search
- Streamlit dashboard for visualization
- Comprehensive test suite
- Cross-platform \(Windows, macOS, Linux\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add comprehensive documentation, licensing, and roadmap

- Add dual license \(free for personal, commercial license required for enterprise\)
- Add USER_GUIDE.md with complete usage documentation
- Add ROADMAP.md with planned features through 2026
- Add CONTRIBUTING.md with contribution guidelines
- Update README.md with better branding and structure
- Link all documentation together

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
